flawed_nl_solution:
The total amount of money that Zachary received from selling his video games is $40*5 = $<<40*5=200>>200
Jason received 30/100*$200 = $<<30/100*200=2000/3>>2000/3 more than the amount Zachary received after selling his games.
The total amount of money that Jason received is $2000/3+$200 = $<<2000/3+200=2600/3>>2600/3
Together, Zachary and Jason received $2600/3+$200 = $<<2600/3+200=3200/3>>3200/3 from the sale of their video games.
Ryan received $2600/3+$50=$<<2600/3+50=2750/3>>2750/3 from the sale of his video games.
The three friends made a total of $2750/3+$3200/3 = $<<2750/3+3200/3=5950/3>>5950/3 from the sale of the video games.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 2000/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
